Package org.eclipse.ecf.core.util

Interface Summary
Event Event 'tag' interface.
ICallable Interface defining a block that can be called, can return an Object result and throw an arbitrary Throwable
IEventProcessor Event processor for processing events in a sequence.
IExceptionHandler Contract for general exception handler
 

Class Summary
AbstractFactory  
AsynchResult Class to represent asynchronous result (aka Future)
Base64 Encode/decode byte arrays into base64 strings.
Trace A utility for tracing debug information.
 

Exception Summary
ECFException  
TimeoutException Timeout exception thrown when timeout occurs
